results.title: Simvastatin attenuates aluminium chloride-induced neurobehavioral impairments through activation of TGF-beta1/ SMAD2 and GSK3beta/beta-catenin signalling pathways.
results.text_hl: Hence, this study aimed to investigate the mechanistic role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@ against @CHEMICAL_Aluminum_Chloride @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077410 @@@aluminium chloride@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Aluminum_Chloride @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077410 @@@AlCl3@@@) induced @<m>DISEASE_Neurobehavioral_Manifestations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019954 @@@neurobehavioral impairments@@@.
